title: crash
body: So basically when I open the game client it's perfectly fine but when I get into the game it just crashed my whole computer? I don't know why it's happening but it so if you can help me ty

replies.body: I'd like to help out but need more details.  What do you mean exactly by crashing?  Are you getting any error messages?  Let me know!
It just freeze to the point where I can do nothing and makes the same weird noise and then few moments later it turns off

Thanks, this helps a lot!  Some players have had this issue after a windows 10 update, and the culprit of this seems to be an issue with the xbox game bar.  Disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) as your first step, which should resolve this for you.  Let me know if you have any questions!
